data.title: Direct deposit for individuals with a foreign bank account
data.meta_description: Direct deposit information for Canadians with a foreign bank account, including how to enrol in payments or change information on file
data.text:
American Samoa

Currency: USD

Bank Sort code: 9 digits (called ABA)

Account number: Maximum 17 characters

Account type: Select Savings or Chequing

Full Bank Name and Address

Telephone:

1‑613‑941‑6402 (collect calls)

TDD/ TTY (for persons with a hearing loss):

1‑844‑524‑5286

SWIFT/BIC code: 8 or 11 characters

Account number: 22 characters
